P

playerBackTrack(int, int) - Method in class playerObj
Method playerMovement will recursively check each direction, and if the player is not able to move in any of them, to start backtracking and placing 0s to show that the player should not go this way again.
playerMovement(int, int) - Method in class playerObj
Method playerMovement will recursively check each direction, and if the player is able to move in any of them, to move.
playerMoves - Variable in class playerObj
Char[][] playerMoves is a 2D array containing a players moves through the maze.
playerObj - Class in <Unnamed>
Class playerObj controls the movement and printing of movement through the maze.
playerObj(char[][]) - Constructor for class playerObj
Constructor playerObj sets the players state to the initial maze.
printAll() - Method in class playerObj
method printAll prints player movement and the final solution through the maze.
